name: nuclide-health
description: Provides some simple process stats in the status bar

analyticsTimeout.description: Polling interval for sending aggregated health stats as analytics (in minutes).

viewTimeout.description: Polling interval for showing health stats in status views (in seconds).

showCpu.title: Show CPU usage as a percentage
showCpu.description: Show CPU average for the last minute as a percentage in status bar (except on Windows).

showHeap.description: Show heap usage as a percentage in status bar.

showMemory.description: Show memory usage in MB in status bar.

showKeyLatency.description: Show latest editor key latency in milliseconds in status bar.

showActiveHandles.title: Show Handles
showActiveHandles.description: Show number of active handles open in Node in status bar.

showActiveRequests.title: Show Event Loop
showActiveRequests.description: Show number of active requests in the Node event loop in status bar.
